about_the_game:
Talk about a pocket rocket! The Chevalier Mortar is an M1 Mortar repurposed as a shotgun! With unbelievable stopping power and an explosive finish, it won’t just stop the dead in their tracks, it’ll blow them apart!
This Weapon Bundle contains;
- The Chevalier Mortar Shotgun
- 2 Charms (Easter Egg + Zombie Rabbit Foot)
- 2 Bespoke Weapon Skins (Zombified, Snakeskin).
